reviews.text: This is my second time staying at Coniston Guest House and I will stay here on my next visit. Big rooms, nice comfy beds and the best shower I ever experienced in England. Very nice full English breakfast with cereals. Deborah is a very nice host.
reviews.title: Very nice B&B some distance from the city center

reviews.text: I stayed at this B&B form late July - November 2010 whilst working in Sheffield for 4 months.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B close to main transport links

reviews.text: It is an excellent B&B, clean, friendly and very convenient for the tram network being 5 minutes walk from the Malin Bridge tram stop. For anyone working for a period in Sheffield it is the ideal place to stay.
reviews.title: A great value-for-money B&B

reviews.text: I have stayed here for business in Sheffield several times. It is located at the end of the tram line at Hillsborough or Mallin Bridge so don't expect a city centre location. The benefits far outweigh this - nice rooms, quiet locations, excellent service and very good value for money. There are places to eat about ten minutes walk away in Hillsborough. For posher and lively places get the tram into the City.
reviews.title: Superb B&B

reviews.text: Very glad we stayed at Coniston Guest House with Deborah. Absolutely perfect. Great English breakfast. Will stay again. Thank you!
reviews.title: excellent stay and very welcoming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night. Value was good. In the Hillsborough part of Sheffield and a short walk to the Tram line so easy access to town centre. Room was clean. Towels could do to be replaced as quite hard. Breakfast good and overall a fair price for the stay.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: Very comfortable, clean and peaceful, friendly, relaxed atmosphere. A lot of thoughtful extra details. Lovely place to stay and would like to use this B&B again. Thank you very much to Deborah and her staff
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: I have stayed at the Coniston four times and have always enjoyed staying there. Deborah is a very friendly and charming landlady. The house is very tastefully furnished and the rooms are lovingly maintained. Like many places in Sheffield it is perched up on a hill and there are good views of the locality from some of the rooms. At £50 for a twin it has to be one of the best value B & Bs anywhere.
reviews.title: Terrific value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks Deborah for a warm welcome, really enjoyed the stay with you. The Coniston is Very clean,nicely maintained and the breakfast both mornings was Lovely. We were given a family room which is spacious.There are extras in the room . . .Iron/trouser press/hair drier/sewing kit/shoe clean kit/cotton buds/tissues/and even some mint imperials! Bathroom also had the usual extras and all were renewed daily which very often isn't the case in other places we've stayed.The location is perfect for the Hillsboro' entertainments and the Rivelin Valley is only a ten minute stroll away!
reviews.title: "Brilliant Weekend stay"

reviews.text: We only booked here because we couldn't get in our usual B&B in Sheffield but this has definately become our 'new' usual B&B. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
reviews.title: Second time going back for third

reviews.text: I have stayed here on many occasions when working in Sheffield, and always made very welcome.
reviews.title: Super Bed and Breakfast

reviews.text: Very friendly hosts.
reviews.title: Excellent Guest house better than a hotel

reviews.text: Very quiet location, with car parking.
reviews.title: Great Value with a smile

reviews.text: I have stayed at a number of B&Bs in Sheffield, but this is the best.
reviews.title: Could not ask for more

reviews.text: Super cooked breakfast to start the day.
reviews.title: The best value B&B in South Yorkshire

reviews.text: Enjoyable stay. Very pleasant hostess. Warm room with en-suite bathroom and everything you need from ironing board to hair dryer. Very nice breakfast in a nice front room. Quiet.
reviews.title: good value

reviews.text: Very good value and recommended.
reviews.title: Very friendly and good value for money.

reviews.text: We stayed at he Coniston Guest House for one nigh while we in Sheffield for a family gathering. We received a warm welcome and the accommodation was just what we needed. Everything was clean and comfortable. All in all and excellent service!
reviews.title: Great Find in the Heart of Hillsborough

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean rooms, great breakfast and a very affordable price.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: Its brilliant to find a B&B like this in the heart of Hillsborough with off-road parking and so close the Super Tram stop for convenient access to the town centre.
reviews.title: Just great place to stay
